name: tumblr quote restyle
description: Restyle quotes posts to look like regular posts, because frankly the current style has. problems. Many problems.
additional_info: If you'd like a javascript version (through xkit), because adding before & after quotation marks depends on having paragraphs: 1. have new-xkit installed in your browser and go to www.tumblr.com/xkit_editor 2. click "New Extension" 3. copy-paste the code from here into the "Script" tab 4. copy-paste the code from here into the "Stylesheet" tab 5. save & profit
